title: Inquiry-Based Differential Equations Intensive Short-Term Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: High school mathematics (basic calculus) proficiency and workplace experience
context.additional_context: Learners comprising professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, interested in practical applications of differential equations to real workplace problems

learning_goals: Learners can model and interpret problems arising in real job scenarios using differential equations.
Learners enhance conceptual understanding and reasoning abilities in differential equations through inquiry-based learning activities.
Learners collaborate with peers to discuss and explain differential equation problem-solving processes using online collaboration tools.
Learners can revise and refine their problem-solving strategies by incorporating formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
